_About this game
A 3D avoidance gimmick game.

_Starting method
Please execute “PetitContest12.exe”.

_Basic operation(Keyboard recommended)
[keyboard]
WASD key: Move character
Mouse: Title UI selection
ESC key: End of game

[Gamepad]
A: Decision
Left stick: character movement, selection cursor movement
